title: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect
body: I've been placed in a 20 minute Low Priority Queue for 5 match made games because of this issue. This error only happens once in a blue moon, and I know for certain it is not a problem on my part. Does anybody know what is going on?

replies.body: I couldn't say for sure why a disconnection would happen everyone once in a while, could be something with your ISP.  Just in case, though, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any local possibilities with how your network reaches the game server.  I'm confident this could help, but it's hard to say if it happens every once in a while.
